building_blocks.name: Issues
building_blocks.about: Showcasing what the open issues are, letting people know they are outstanding, saving the need to report.
building_blocks.category_about: What is currently happening on an API platform, providing a real time heart beat of the current status of API resources.

building_blocks.name: Status RSS
building_blocks.about: Providing an RSS feed for a status dashboard, allowing users to receive updates on any website, and via any RSS client.
building_blocks.category_about: What is currently happening on an API platform, providing a real time heart beat of the current status of API resources.

building_blocks.name: Status Dashboard
building_blocks.about: A single location, at dedicated subdomain, providing status update(s) for all API resources, giving developers a place to go when looking to see if platform is available.
building_blocks.category_about: What is currently happening on an API platform, providing a real time heart beat of the current status of API resources.

building_blocks.name: Status History
building_blocks.about: Providing a history of status, usually by day, and showing results month by month, or week by week, as long as status has been tracked for an API.
building_blocks.category_about: What is currently happening on an API platform, providing a real time heart beat of the current status of API resources.

building_blocks.name: Road Map
building_blocks.about: A detailed list of what additions and changes are being planned as part of API operations, giving consumers a place where they can go learn about what is next in an APIs evolution.
building_blocks.category_about: How are we planning, and communicating updates to the platform? Providing a map of how things have changed across the platform, from versioning of the API itself, to even documentation, and other aspects of platform operations.

building_blocks.name: Idea Submission
building_blocks.about: Allow for the submission of ideas, using the Github issue management, or other system, giving API consumers the ability to potentially contribute to the API road map.
building_blocks.category_about: How are we planning, and communicating updates to the platform? Providing a map of how things have changed across the platform, from versioning of the API itself, to even documentation, and other aspects of platform operations.

building_blocks.name: Change Log
building_blocks.about: A detailed list of changes have been made to an API platform, giving consumers a single place they can go to learn about what changes have been made.
building_blocks.category_about: What has already happened with a platform, providing a single archive of all changes made to the platform, for consumers to review at any time.

building_blocks.name: Email Change Notifications
building_blocks.about: Sending of email to API consumers anytime there is an addition to the road map, or a change in the status of the API platform.
building_blocks.category_about: Notifications about changes to the road map, and status of overall operations that will impact API consumers.

building_blocks.name: SMS Change Notification
building_blocks.about: Sending of SMS to API consumers anytime there is an addition to the road map, or a change in the status of the API platform.
building_blocks.category_about: Notifications about changes to the road map, and status of overall operations that will impact API consumers.
